Module io.inverno.mod.base
Package io.inverno.mod.base.converter

Interface Converter<A,B>

Type Parameters:
A - the encoded type
B - the decoded type
All Superinterfaces:
Decoder<A,B>, Encoder<B,A>
All Known Subinterfaces:
MediaTypeConverter<From>, ObjectConverter<From>, ReactiveConverter<A,B>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteBufConverter, CompositeConverter, StringCompositeConverter, StringConverter
public interface Converter<A,B> extends Decoder<A,B>, Encoder<B,A>

A converter decodes and encodes between two types of object.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
